mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_IDCARD, USER_AGE, USER_SEX, USER_TELEPHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDTIME, USER_DELFLAG, USER_FZR, USER_LXR, USER_DWJJ, USER_SJDM, USER_SFLS, USER_JLID, SFJY,USER_SFZH
mapper.select:
select
from USERINFO where USER_DELFLAG = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

from USERINFO where USER_DELFLAG = 1 AND USER_JLID = #{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from USERINFO where USER_DELFLAG = 1 and USER_SFLS = 'æ˜¯' and USER_ADDTIME < #{currentdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into USERINFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_IDCARD, USER_AGE, USER_SEX, USER_TELEPHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDTIME, USER_DELFLAG, USER_FZR, USER_LXR, USER_DWJJ, USER_SJDM, USER_SFLS, USER_JLID, SFJY,USER_SFZH) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAge,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTelephone,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userFzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDwjj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSfls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userJlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfjy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update USERINFO
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_IDCARD = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_AGE = #{userAge,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TELEPHONE = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ADDTIME = #{userAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_DELFLAG = #{userDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USER_FZR = #{userFzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_LXR = #{userLxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_DWJJ = #{userDwjj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_SJDM = #{userSjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_SFLS = #{userSfls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_JLID = #{userJlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFJY = #{sfjy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_SFZH = #{userSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update USERINFO set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_IDCARD = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_AGE = #{userAge,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TELEPHONE = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ADDTIME = #{userAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_DELFLAG = #{userDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, USER_FZR = #{userFzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_LXR = #{userLxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_DWJJ = #{userDwjj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_SJDM = #{userSjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_SFLS = #{userSfls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_JLID = #{userJlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFJY = #{sfjy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_SFZH = #{userSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_DELFLAG=1
and SFJY = '${sfjy}'
and USER_NAME like '%${userName}%'
and USER_IDCARD like '%${userIdcard}%'
and USER_TELEPHONE like '%${userTelephone}%'
and USER_EMAIL like '%${userEmail}%'
and USER_SFZH like '%${userSfzh}%'

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from USERINFO T where USER_DELFLAG=1
and SFJY = '${sfjy}'
and USER_NAME like '%${userName}%'
and USER_IDCARD like '%${userIdcard}%'
and USER_TELEPHONE like '%${userTelephone}%'
and USER_EMAIL like '%${userEmail}%'
and USER_SFZH like '%${userSfzh}%'
order by T.USER_ID desc ) as t1 order by USER_ID asc) as t2 order by USER_ADDTIME desc
mapper.update: update USERINFO set SFJY = '0' where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update USERINFO set SFJY = '1' where USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_DELFLAG=1
and USER_NAME like '%${userName}%'
and USER_IDCARD like '%${userIdcard}%'
and USER_TELEPHONE like '%${userTelephone}%'
and USER_EMAIL like '%${userEmail}%'

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from USERINFO T where USER_DELFLAG=1
and USER_NAME like '%${userName}%'
and USER_IDCARD like '%${userIdcard}%'
and USER_TELEPHONE like '%${userTelephone}%'
and USER_EMAIL like '%${userEmail}%'
order by T.USER_ID desc ) as t1 order by USER_ID asc) as t2 order by USER_ADDTIME desc
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_IDCARD = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_TELEPHONE = #{_parameter}
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_SFZH = #{userSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from USERINFO where USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
